name: IS_REFERENCED_BY
body_snippet:
function IS_REFERENCED_BY(PARM_PRIMARY_KEY_TO_CHECK VARCHAR2,PARM_TAB_NAME VARCHAR2,PARM_EXCEPTION VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL) return varchar2 is
  ---------------------------
  -- WRITER : TARIQ SARWAR
  ---------------------------
  
  -- THIS FUNCTION CHECK WETHER THE GIVEN ID AND TABLE_NAME IS REFERENCED BY ANY OTHER TABLE
  -- IN THE CURRENT SCHEMA AND RETURN THE CONSTRAINT NAME WHICH WILL INVALIDATED IF THIS ID 
  -- WILL BE DELETED FROM ITS TABLE
  
  -----------
  --PARAMETER DETAIL:
  -----------
       --   PRIMARY_KEY_TO_CHECK   : THE PRIMARY KEY (MAY BE COMMA SEPARATED STRING IN CASE 
       --                            OF COMPOSITE PRIMARY KEY)
       
       --   PARM_TAB_NAME          : TABLE NAME   
  		 --   parm_exception				 : It will contain a varchar2 string separated by "," , which will tell the procedure not to include thses tables in check
       --   RETURN                 :IT WILL RETURN A VARCHAR STRING CONTAINING A MESSAGE AND 
       --                           CONSTRAINT NAME WHICH IS INVALIDATED  
       --                           /  
       --                           OTHERWISE IT WILL BE NULL,SHOWING THAT THIS KEY MAY BE DELETED 
       --                           AND NO CONSTRAINT WILL BE INVALIDATED
  
  Result VARCHAR2(500);
---------------------------------------
  SELEC  VARCHAR2(100)     := 'SELECT 1 ';  -- SELECT PART OF DYNAMIC QUERY
  FRM    VARCHAR2(1000);                   -- FROM   PART OF DYNAMIC QUERY
  WHER   VARCHAR2(5000);
